body:
Honestly, if we could only get the whole set of Sense Vol. 1-12, all in all, in English, Chinese Traditional (Taiwan), and Japanese Versions, so then, I’d most definite love to  read them altogether right here and now asap, please! 

Once again, thank you all so much for taking my feedback so seriously indeed! Amen!

Excuse me, but so who could go upload all 10 Volumes of Sense by Haruki in English/Chinese/Korean/French asap, please?

Once again, thank you so much indeed for your care and cooperation. Amen!
Inhate  this series, too much delution. Just keep the real things stupd author
